content: AMA The Fifth Person Investments Asked by Chia Ming HoAsked on 20 Feb 2019what is the biggest disruption to conventional investment in this era?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Victor Chng, Co-Founder at Fifth Person Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 21 Feb 2019Hi,I don't think there is something that can disrupt conventional investing but I think that the method will evolve over time. For instance, in the past US market can find many net-net stocks to invest but right now there are little of them. Hence, investors evolve their method looking at quality company instead of net-net company.0 comments1
